name: Abuna's Chant
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• You gain 5 life.
• Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

name: Advanced Hoverguard
oracle_text:
Flying
{U}: Advanced Hoverguard gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"They are like their vedalken masters: untouchable, aloof, and omnipresent."
—Bruenna, Neurok leader

name: Anodet Lurker
oracle_text: When Anodet Lurker dies, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: These machines build fearsome visages out of scrap metal to scare off predators who would otherwise be eager to consume them.

name: Armed Response
oracle_text: Armed Response deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of Equipment you control.
flavor_text: Raksha watched as the goblins continued to pour onto the Razor Fields. "They just don't know when to stop, do they?"

name: Baton of Courage
oracle_text:
Flash
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
Remove a charge counter from Baton of Courage: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Battered Golem
oracle_text:
Battered Golem doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, you may untap Battered Golem.
flavor_text: A dent marks every year of service, and it has as much rust as glory.

name: Blind Creeper
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, Blind Creeper gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It shuns everything except its next meal.

name: Cackling Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Target player loses 1 life.
flavor_text: Its laughter drives needles through your mind.

name: Condescend
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Conjurer's Bauble
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Conjurer's Bauble: Put up to one target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. Draw a card.
flavor_text: It is the moment of discovery, the triumph of the mind, the reimagining of past glory.

name: Dawn's Reflection
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional two mana in any combination of colors.
flavor_text: Only Sylvok magic could truly capture the perfection of a Mirrodin sunrise.

name: Dross Crocodile
flavor_text: The necrogen may have taken its sight, but it can still taste the fear of its prey.

name: Early Frost
oracle_text: Tap up to three target lands.
flavor_text: Under its mists, the earth sleeps.

name: Ferocious Charge
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Fill with Fright
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Fleshgrafter
oracle_text: Discard an artifact card: Fleshgrafter gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Necrogen enflames certain emotional centers in the Morioks' brains: hate, aggression, and especially greed.

name: Goblin Brawler
oracle_text:
First strike
Goblin Brawler can't be equipped.
flavor_text: Perhaps he shuns technology. Perhaps he appreciates nature. Perhaps he doesn't know the difference.

name: Healer's Headdress
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn."
{W}{W}: Attach Healer's Headdress to target creature you control.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Heliophial
oracle_text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
{2}, Sacrifice Heliophial: It deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to any target.

name: Horned Helm
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.
{G}{G}: Attach Horned Helm to target creature you control.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Into Thin Air
oracle_text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Return target artifact to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Perhaps I should take Mirrodin apart and begin again."
—Memnarch

name: Krark-Clan Ogre
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The Krark Clan believes it's caught an ogre. The ogre believes he's caught seven goblins.

name: Leonin Squire
oracle_text: When Leonin Squire enters the battlefield, return target artifact card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"I may be kha, but without my soldiers, my people, I am nothing."
—Raksha Golden Cub

name: Lose Hope
oracle_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Loxodon Anchorite
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: The loxodon ascribe religious superiority to those born albino, believing them to be spiritually pure.

name: Mana Geyser
oracle_text: Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.
flavor_text: The Quicksilver Sea hissed and bubbled at the indignity. The Vulshok shaman just smiled.

name: Myr Quadropod
oracle_text: {3}: Switch Myr Quadropod's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor_text: Each myr was designed to fill a specific role. This one, for example, was designed to stomp on other myr.

name: Myr Servitor
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Myr Servitor is on the battlefield, each player returns all cards named Myr Servitor from their graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: The Krark Clan enjoys pulling them apart just to watch them reassemble one another.

name: Neurok Stealthsuit
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{U}{U}: Attach Neurok Stealthsuit to target creature you control.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Opaline Bracers
oracle_text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of charge counters on Opaline Bracers.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Pentad Prism
oracle_text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
Remove a charge counter from Pentad Prism: Add one mana of any color.

name: Rain of Rust
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target land.
Entwine {3}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
flavor_text: On Mirrodin, mages who call upon the power of rust are shunned by their people and often turn mercenary to survive.

name: Razorgrass Screen
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Razorgrass Screen blocks each combat if able.
flavor_text: Hand-stitched, and marked by the blood of the Auriok.

name: Sawtooth Thresher
oracle_text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Sawtooth Thresher: Sawtooth Thresher gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

name: Screaming Fury
oracle_text: Target creature gets +5/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: He's got an axe to grind.

name: Serum Visions
oracle_text: Draw a card. Scry 2.

name: Skyhunter Prowler
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text:
"If what I have seen comes to pass, we will need our guardians more than ever."
—Ushanti, leonin seer

name: Skyreach Manta
oracle_text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
Flying
flavor_text: As the dawns break, the manta soars.

name: Spark Elemental
oracle_text:
Trample, haste (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental.
flavor_text: Vulshok shamans summon spark elementals to burn paths through thick underbrush—or through goblin salvage squads.

name: Sparring Collar
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has first strike.
{R}{R}: Attach Sparring Collar to target creature you control.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Stand Firm
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Stasis Cocoon
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text: Though the grip of a golem is strong, the grip of Auriok magic is far stronger.

name: Suntouched Myr
oracle_text: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
flavor_text: As the fifth sun joins the other four, new abilities awaken in the creatures of Mirrodin.

name: Sylvok Explorer
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
flavor_text: Any creature on a druid's shoulder is his family, any land under his feet his home.

name: Tangle Asp
oracle_text: Whenever Tangle Asp blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
flavor_text:
"I have no fangs, yet I constantly bite. I have no scales, yet I slither through you. What am I?"
—Riddle of the viper's venom

name: Tel-Jilad Lifebreather
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text: "The Tangle loans you life. Spend it well."

name: Thermal Navigator
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact: Thermal Navigator gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: It takes off with a roar of superheated wind, startling wild pterons as they survey the ground below.

name: Thought Courier
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: It is telling of the vedalkens' culture that they trust human couriers more than their own comrades.

name: Trinket Mage
oracle_text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 1 or less, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Tyrranax
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Tyrranax gets -1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It outnumbers you one to many.

name: Vicious Betrayal
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice any number of creatures.
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature sacrificed this way.

name: Viridian Scout
oracle_text: {2}{G}, Sacrifice Viridian Scout: It deals 2 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor_text: They know a hoverguard's only blind spot is directly above it.

name: Vulshok Sorcerer
oracle_text:
Haste
{T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Vulshok sorcerers train by leaping into electrified storm clouds. Dead or alive, they come back down with smiles on their faces.

name: Wayfarer's Bauble
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.
